fields.name: AdministratorLogin
fields.description: The administrator's login name of the servers in the cluster.

fields.name: AdministratorLoginPassword
fields.description: The password of the administrator login. Required for creation.

fields.name: CitusVersion
fields.description: The Citus extension version on all cluster servers.

fields.name: CoordinatorEnablePublicIPAccess
fields.description: If public access is enabled on coordinator.

fields.name: CoordinatorServerEdition
fields.description: The edition of a coordinator server (default: GeneralPurpose). Required for creation.

fields.name: CoordinatorStorageQuotaInMb
fields.description: The storage of a server in MB. Required for creation. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

fields.name: CoordinatorVCores
fields.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 96). Required for creation. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

fields.name: EarliestRestoreTime
fields.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

fields.name: EnableHa
fields.description: If high availability (HA) is enabled or not for the cluster.

fields.name: EnableShardsOnCoordinator
fields.description: If distributed tables are placed on coordinator or not. Should be set to 'true' on single node clusters. Requires shard rebalancing after value is changed.

fields.name: MaintenanceWindow
fields.description: Maintenance window of a cluster.

fields.name: NodeCount
fields.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a single node configuration with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. 2 or more worker nodes represent multi-node configuration. Node count value cannot be 1. Required for creation.

fields.name: NodeEnablePublicIPAccess
fields.description: If public access is enabled on worker nodes.

fields.name: NodeServerEdition
fields.description: The edition of a node server (default: MemoryOptimized).

fields.name: NodeStorageQuotaInMb
fields.description: The storage in MB on each worker node. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

fields.name: NodeVCores
fields.description: The compute in vCores on each worker node (max: 104). See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

fields.name: PointInTimeUTC
fields.description: Date and time in UTC (ISO8601 format) for cluster restore.

fields.name: PostgresqlVersion
fields.description: The major PostgreSQL version on all cluster servers.

fields.name: PreferredPrimaryZone
fields.description: Preferred primary availability zone (AZ) for all cluster servers.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
fields.description: The private endpoint connections for a cluster.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the cluster

fields.name: ReadReplicas
fields.description: The array of read replica clusters.

fields.name: ServerNames
fields.description: The list of server names in the cluster

fields.name: SourceLocation
fields.description: The Azure region of source cluster for read replica clusters.

fields.name: SourceResourceId
fields.description: The resource id of source cluster for read replica clusters.

fields.name: State
fields.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.
